name: GiveMeSomeFeedbacks !
description:
Little game used for a talk about the need of feedbacks in video games. Made by Rémi Monthiller using the Godot Engine.

Use the arrow keys to move. D-Pad of Gamepads are supported.

Careful with the use of camera shake, not to be sick. You should begin with values less than 0.5 .

Careful, the replay option is not working well. Be sure to disable manually all feedback options before pressing the button. Be sure the player will not press any inputs  while the replay is running.

Sources are available on GitHub.
